title: WhipUp
description: A mobile app for sharing and discovering recipes along with a hands-free cooking mode supported by a virtual assistant

title: Thirft Basket
description: A web platform facilitating the buying and selling of secondhand apparel, with a focus on sustainability and affordability

title: Artsy
description: A space for art enthusiasts to explore, share, and showcase their artworks and collections with a global community

title: InTuition
description: A user-friendly web platform connecting tutors with students for personalized learning experiences and academic support
